chapters.title: Chapter 12: The Amyrlin Seat
chapters.info: Keeper of the Chronicles, p. 158 (122)—Essentially the secretary to the Amyrlin Seat. The Keeper is traditionally chosen from the same Ajah the Amyrlin was raised from, and wears a stole of the color of her Ajah instead of the striped stole of the Amyrlin. The post is currenlty held by Leane Sharif of the Blue Ajah. In theory, the Keeper of the Chronicles serves the Amyrlin Seat and speaks for the Amyrlin Seat; she is all but separate from her Ajah, although less so than the Amyrlin Seat herself. See also Nyram, Beldeine; Sharif, Leane.
